argument.name: Width
argument.descripiton: Numeric. The width of the control in characters, by default based on the default font: Arial 8.

argument.name: Height
argument.descripiton: Numeric. The height of the control in lines, by default based on the default font: Arial 8.

argument.name: Default_Font
argument.descripiton: Pointer. The variable that receives the user font selection. It has 3 components. .facename = the name of the font .size = the point size of the font .allow_raster_expr

page.description: The {FONTLIST} command displays a list of installed fonts.
